name: clipsmart-ai
description: AI-powered video clip generation and transcript processing tool

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:production: cd frontend && REACT_APP_NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build:production && cd backend && npm run start:production
